sentences.sContent: So it was with a certain ebullience that 7,000 residents of Wuhan recently gathered at the Orient Lucky City racecourse to indulge in what the central leadership terms a “social evil”.
sentences.sContent_eng: So it was with a certain ebullience that 7,000 residents of Wuhan recently gathered at the Orient Lucky City racecourse to indulge in what the central leadership terms a “social evil”.
sentences.sCn: 因此，最近7000名武汉居民沸沸扬扬，齐聚东方马城赛马场，全情投入在被中央领导人称作的“社会祸害”里。

words.tran: （赛车用的）跑道；（水车等的）水沟

trans.tranOther: a grass track on which horses race
